data.message: The only shame here is how ignorant you can be. It makes me sick to see how many of these commentaries are against this act of support. Some of you make me re think about how disgusting close mind human beings can be. You should be ashamed of yourself.

replies.message: You make me sick. There, we're even.
Andrew stop being a little homophobic person
Do I make you sick? Okay. Perfect. What is it the exact thing of me that makes you sick? Is it what I said or what you think I am?

Do you want to hear a funny story, Andrew? I'm straight. I tell you this just in case you have thought another thing. I commented because I couldn't believe how many people could be so heartless and cruel. And here you are, to prove and show everything I hate from this world. I believe we are all one. We are human beings. If you think I am disgusting, fine. I don't care.
